Text: New Hire Orientation Cc May New Hire Orientation will go from a day program to half a day The New Hire Orientation will start at am and end at pm The new hires will no longer be given lunch This change was initiated as a result of cost cutting measures We will be distributing the Inside Track at Sally Becks next staff meeting scheduled for This is an additional tool you can use to integrate the employee to your business unit The Inside Track is a supplement to the handouts the new hires receive at orientation It contains general information Windows Microsoft Outlook PRC process and the business unit training expectations We suggest personally greeting and delivering the Inside Track and taking your new hire out to lunch If this is not possible we recommend sending a representative We feel this would be a great way to welcome your new hire to Enron and your business unit Please contact your Human Resources representative if you have any question Regards Frank

Offer Information Cc John I am please to hear that you have verbally accepted our offer to join the Risk Management Group reporting to Stacey White The details of the offer will be outlined for you in a forth coming transfer offer letter My understanding is that you and your family will be going on a house hunting trip to Portland and upon your return providing us with a start date We anticipating your start day to be some time in Mid May I left a message with Lloyd Whiteurst relocations services concerning your decision I recommend you follow up with him to begin setting the ground work for your move to Portland I will also touch base with Amy FitzPatrick HR Portland and Dawn Doucet HR Calgery to ensure everyone is in the loop regarding your transfer Please let me know if you have any questions Regards Frank

RE John Postlethwaite transfer to Portland Cc John Postlethwaites start date in Portland will be May He has used hrs of vacation in and therefore will carryover hrs of vacation to Portland Please let me know if you have any questions Regards Frank Original Message From Henry Patricia Sent Wednesday May AM To De Jesus Frank Cc Doucet Dawn Subject John Postlethwaite transfer to Portland Hi Frank Do you know the date that Johns transfer is effective Will you please let us know once you have a firm date so we can take him off Canadian payroll and SAP Thanks Tricia Henry Canada HR Tel
